645:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
645:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīyeṃ madhyamaṃ paṭavidhānaṃ madhyamakarmopayikasādhanavidhiḥ samāsato tāṃ bhāṣiṣye |
645:4: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru | bhāṣiṣye ||
645:5: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantamevamāhaḥ – tad vadatu bhagavāṃ lokānukampako śāstā sarvasattvahite rataḥ |
645:8: evamukte bhagavāṃ mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavānetadavocat – śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ ! ādau tāvad śīlavrataśaucācāraniyamajapahomadhyānavidhiṃ yatra pratiṣṭhitā sarvamantracaryāsādhanakarmāṇyavandhyāni bhavanti saphalāni |
645:13: ādau tāvad vidyāvrataśīlacaryāsamādānaṃ prathamata eva samādadet |
645:15: tvadīyaṃ kalparājoktaṃ vyaktaṃ medhāvinaṃ labdhvācāryābhiṣekatvaṃ śāsanābhijñaṃ kuśalaṃ vyaktaṃ dhārmikaṃ satyavādinaṃ mahotsāhaṃ kṛtajñaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ nātivṛddhaṃ nātibālaṃ nispṛhaṃ sarvalābhasatkāreṣu brahmacāriṇaṃ kāruṇikaṃ na lobhamātreṇa bhogahetorvā anunayahetorvā na mṛṣāṃ vadate kaḥ purnarvādo svalpamātraiṇaiva lobhamohaprakāraiḥ dṛḍhapratijñā samatā sarvabhūteṣu dayāvāṃ dānaśīlaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tvadīyaguhyamantrānujāpī pūrvasevakṛtavidyaḥ tvadīyamaṇḍalasamanupūrvapraviṣṭaḥ lokajñaḥ vidhijñaḥ samanugrāhakaḥ kāryāvāṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ śreyasapravṛttaḥ abhīru acchambhinamamaṅkubhūtaḥ dṛḍhavīryaḥ avyādhitaḥ yena vyādhinā akarmaśīlī mahoccakulaprasūtaśceti |
645:17: sādhakaśca tatsamaḥ nyūno vā kiñcidaṅgaiḥ tādṛśaṃ maṇḍalācāryamabhyarthya prārthayet |
645:20: tatastena maṇḍalācāryeṇa pūrvanirdiṣṭena vidhinā śiṣyāṃ yathāpūrvaṃ parīkṣya praveśayet |
645:24: rahasyatantramudrākarmāṇi ca prabhūtakālenaiva suparīkṣya āśayaṃ jñātvā darśayet |
645:26: tataḥ śiṣyeṇa maṇḍalācāryasya yathāśaktitaḥ ācāryo vā yena tuṣyeta,
645:31: tatastena sādhakena anyatamaṃ mantraṃ gṛhītvā ekāntaṃ gatvā pūrvanirdiṣṭe sthāne peyālaṃ taireva mantraiḥ āhvānanavisarjanapradīpagandhadhūpabalinivedyaṃ maṇḍaloktena vidhinā vistareṇa karttavyam |
645:32: āhūya arghamāsanaṃ dattvā trisandhyā trisnāyī tricailaparivartī jāpaṃ kuryāt pratyahaṃ tatra sandhyākālaṃ nāma rātryantāt prabhṛti yāvad yugamātrādityodayam |
645:34: madhyandine ca āditye ubhayānte yugamātraṃ pramāṇaṃ vyomni sanniśritaṃ ravimaṇḍalaṃ madhyaṃ sandhyamucyate |
645:35: astamanakāle ca yugamātraśeṣaṃ tritīyaṃ sandhyamucyata iti ||
645:52: laukikā ye ca mantrā vai vajrāntakulayorapi |
645:62: tathā viśiṣṭo ācāryo prārthanīyo sadā tu vai |
645:64: abhiṣekaṃ tu tenaivaṃ dattaṃ bhavati mahat phalam |
645:66: alaṅghyaṃ tasya vacanaṃ śiṣyaiḥ kartavya yatnataḥ |
645:68: svalpamātrā prabhūtā vā yena vā tuṣṭi gacchati |
645:70: tathaiva śiṣyo dharmajño ācāryāya dade dhanam |
645:72: puṣkalaṃ gatimāpnoti śiṣyo pūjyastu ta gurum |
645:76: sarve devāstu tuṣyante satkriyā tu gurau sadā |
645:78: samayānupraveśināṃ pūrvaṃ prathamaṃ vā sādhakena tu |
645:79: jano vā tatsamo vāpi utkṛṣṭo vā bhaved yadi ||
645:81: tenāpi tasya tantre'smiṃ upadeśaḥ sadā tu vai ||
645:83: na matsaro bhavet tatra śiṣye'smiṃ pūrvanirmite ||
645:87: snigdhasantānānudharā nu mantraṃ dadyāttu tatra vai ||
645:88: ācāryo śiṣyamevaṃ tu śiṣyo vā gurudarśane |
645:90: teṣāṃ nityaṃ tu mārgaṃ vai mantracaryānudarśane |
645:92: dhṛtiṃ tuṣṭiṃ ca lebhe tau tathā śiṣya guruḥ sadā |
645:101: śiṣyeṇaiva tu tasmai tu mantraṃ gṛhya yathātamam ||
645:104: pitṛvat praṇamya śirasā vainato gacchaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ |
645:109: mahāraṇyaṃ parvatāgraṃ tu nadīkūle śucau tathā ||
645:121: prātarutthāya śayanāt snātvā caiva śuce jale ||
645:124: mantrapūtaṃ tato kṛtvā jalaṃ caukṣaṃ sanirmalam |
645:126: tatotthāya taṭe sthitvā hastau prakṣālya mṛttikaiḥ |
645:132: sugandhapuṣpaistathā śāstu ardhaṃ dattvā tu jāpinaḥ |
645:133: praṇamya śirasā buddhāṃ tadā tu śiṣyasambhavāṃ ||
645:137: japaṃ kuryāt pratatnena akṣasūtreṇa tena tu ||
645:138: yathālabdhaṃ tu mantraṃ vai nānyamantraṃ tadā japet |
645:139: atihīnaṃ ca varjītaṃ atiutkṛṣṭa eva vā ||
645:141: atyuccaṃ varjayed yatnād vacanaṃ cāpi cetaram ||
645:143: nātyuccaṃ nātihīnaṃ ca madhyamaṃ tu sadā japet ||
645:146: gupte cātmavide deśe japenmantraṃ tu madhyamam |
645:147: tathā jape tu prayuktaṃ syāt kaścinmantrārthasuśrutaḥ |
645:151: caturthe rātribhāge tu tadardha ardha eva tu |
645:155: ato vyomne dite bhānoḥ mantrajāpaṃ tadā tyajet |
645:156: mantrajāpaṃ tadā tyaktvā visarjyārghaṃ dadau vratī ||
645:159: pustakā daśabhūmākhyāḥ pūjyā vācyāstu vai sadā |
645:161: svamantraṃ mantranāthaṃ ca tato gacchenna jīvikam |
645:165: gṛhe tu dhārmike sattve praviśed bhikṣāṃ japī sadā |
645:170: arīn mardayate nityaṃ ripubhirna ca hanyate ||
645:171: evaṃ mantrī sadā grāmaṃ praviśed bhikṣānujīvinaḥ |
645:172: rañjanīyaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ śabdāṃstu vai śubhām ||
645:176: krimibhiḥ klinnaḥ śmaśānasthaṃ anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ kalevaram ||
645:177: bāliśā yatra mūḍhā vai bhramanti gatipañcake |
645:184: sīdanti ciramadhvānaṃ yatra sattvā śuce ratāḥ ||
645:186: na kṣayaṃ janma teṣāṃ vai duḥkhavārisamaplutām ||
645:187: duḥkhamūlaṃ tathā hyukto striyā buddhaistu kevalaḥ |
645:191: narakaṃ tiryalokaṃ ca pretalokaṃ ca sāsuram |
645:192: mānuṣyaṃ lokaṃ vai divyaṃ divyaṃ caiva gatiḥ sadā ||
645:195: strīṣu saktā narā mūḍhāḥ kuṇameṇaiva kroṣṭukāḥ |
645:196: yatra sattvā ratā nityaṃ tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ sahanti vai ||
645:200: tejasvino jitamitrāḥ teṣāṃ duḥkho na vidyate ||
645:207: na tasya gatirutkṛṣṭā na cāpi gatimadhyamā |
645:210: na cāpi mārgaṃ dideśaṃ vai nirvāṇapuragāminam ||
645:211: kutaḥ sidhyanti mantrā vai bāliśasyeha kutsite |
645:213: na cāpi nākapṛṣṭhaṃ vai na ca saukhyaparāyaṇaḥ |
645:215: chinno vā tālavṛkṣastu mastake tu yadā punaḥ |
645:218: duḥśīlo pāpakarmastu strīṣu saṅgī punaḥ sadā |
645:222: nānyeṣāṃ kathitā siddhiḥ bāliśāṃ strīṣu mūrchitām |
645:231: niḥprāṇake tadā ambhe prathamaṃ jaṅghameva tu ||
645:233: apasavyaṃ punaḥ kṛtvā hastaṃ prakṣālya mṛttikaiḥ ||
645:234: pūrvasaṃsthāpitaiḥ śuddhaiḥ śucibhiḥ sapta eva tu |
645:240: ya jāpino yadā mantrī tat kuryāttu sadā punaḥ |
645:242: dakṣiṇe lokanāthasy maṇḍale tu sadā iha |
645:246: hastamātrārdhahastaṃ vā kuryā cāpi dine dine |
645:247: gupte deśe tadā jāpī pratyahaṃ pāpanāśanā ||
645:253: upaspṛśya punarmantrī dve trayo vā sadā punaḥ ||
645:254: āmṛśeta tato vaktraṃ karṇaśrautrau tathaiva ca |
645:257: vārāṃ pañcasaptaṃ vā kuryāt sarvaṃ yathāvidhim ||
645:260: yatra pratiṣṭhitā vāri nimnāgā codbhave tathā |
645:263: pūrvasanniśrito yatra vaśe tatra tu taṃ vajret ||
645:264: gatvā taṃ tu vai deśaṃ nyaset pātraṃ taṃ japī |
645:265: upaspṛśya tataḥ kṣipraṃ gṛhya pātraṃ tathā punaḥ ||
645:266: pātre mṛnmaye parṇe rājate hemna eva vā |
645:268: nivedyaṃ śāstuno dadyāt svamantraṃ mantrarāṭ punaḥ
645:271: nātmānupāyā mantrajño kuryād yuktā tu sarvataḥ ||
645:290: śakto hi sevituṃ mantrā bhojane'smiṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
645:292: mātrajñatā ca bhuktesmiṃ siddhistasya na durlabhā |
645:295: tathaiva mantrī mantrajño āhāraṃ sthitaye dadau ||
645:299: ata eva muniḥ śreṣṭho ityuvāca mahādyutiḥ ||
645:300: kāśyapo nāma nāmena purā tasmiṃ sadā bhuvi |
645:301: śreyasārtthaṃ hi bhūtānāṃ idaṃ mantraṃ prabhāṣata ||
645:305: āhārārtthaṃ tu bhūtānāṃ idaṃ mantravaraṃ vadet ||
645:307: mahyedaṃ vacanaṃ mantraṃ gṛhṇa tvaṃ vyādhināśanam ||
645:308: kṣudvyādhipīḍitā ye tu ye tu sattvā pipāsitāḥ |
645:314: ityuktvā munibhiḥ agro mantraṃ bhāṣeta vistaram |
645:318: apadā bahupadā cāpi dvipadā cāpi catuṣpadāḥ |
645:321: saṃkṣepato nu vakṣyāmi śṛṇvadhvaṃ bhūtakāṃkṣiṇam || iti ||
645:323: tadyathā - om gagane gaganagañje ānaya sarvaṃ lahu lahu samayamanusmara ākarṣaṇi mā vilamba yathepsitaṃ me sampādaya svāhā |
645:325: atrāntare bhagavatā kāśyapena samyak sambuddhena vidyāmantrapadāni savistarāṇi sarvaṃ taṃ gaganaṃ mahārhabhojanaparipūrṇameghaṃ sandṛśyate sma |
645:326: sarvaṃ taṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ bhojanameghasañchannagaganatalaṃ sandṛśyate sma |
645:328: yathābhirucitaiścāharaiḥ bhojanakṛtyaṃ kṣudduḥkhapraśamanārthaṃ pipāsitasya pānaṃ pānīyaṃ cāṣṭāṅgopetaṃ vāridhāraṃ tatraiva manīṣitaṃ nipatati sma ||
645:329: sarvasattvāśca tasmiṃ samaye tasmiṃ kṣaṇe sarvakṣudvyādhipraśamanasarvatṛṣāpanayanaṃ ca kṛtāmabhūt |
645:330: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat āścaryaprāpto audvilyaprāpto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitā |
645:331: bhagavāṃ kāśyapaśca tathāgatavihāraiḥ vihāriyuriti mayā ca bhagavatā śākyamunināpyetarhi bhāṣitā cābhyanumoditā ca ||
645:332: asmiṃ kalparājottame sarvasattvānāmarthāya kṣutpipāsāpanayanārthaṃ sarvamantrajāpināṃ ca viśeṣataḥ pūrvaṃ tāvajjāpinā imaṃ mantraṃ sādhayitavyam |
645:334: parvatāgramabhiruhya ṣaḍ lakṣāṇi japet triśuklabhojī kṣīrāhāro vā |
645:335: tato tatraiva parvatāgre āryamañjuśriyasya madhyamaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pūrvavanmahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā udārataraṃ ca bali nivedyam |
645:336: anenaiva kāśyapasamyaksambuddhairbhāṣitena mantreṇa khadirasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya audumbarasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ sārdrāṇāṃ vitastimātrāṇāṃ śrīphalasamidhānāṃ vā aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt ||
645:340: āryamañjuśriyāṣṭākṣarahṛdayena ātmarakṣā kāryā maṇḍalabandhaśca sahāyānāṃ ca pūrvavat |
645:342: striyaśca sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitāḥ prabhāmālinī diśāścāvabhāsyamānā sādhakasyāgrato kurvate |
645:347: tadaha eva ātmapañcaviṃśatimasya sahayairvā yathābhirucitaiḥ kāmikaṃ bhojanaṃ prayacchati |
645:349: tataḥ sādhakena visarjyārghaṃ dattvā paṭaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya paṭamādāya sarvabuddhabodhisattvān praṇamya yatheṣṭaṃ sthānaṃ sādhanopayikaṃ pūrvanirdiṣṭaṃ mahāraṇyaṃ parvatāgraṃ vā nirmānuṣaṃ vā sthānaṃ gantavyam ||
645:351: prativasatā ca tasmiṃ sthāne ākāśagamanādikarmāṇi kuryāt |
645:352: tato sādhakena pūrvavat kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭena madhyamaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratiṣṭhāpya pūrvavat khadirakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya trisandhyaṃ śvetapuṣpāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt divasānyekaviṃśati ||
645:355: ākāśagamanamantardhānabodhisattvabhūmipratyekabuddhatvaṃ śrāvakatvaṃ pañcābhijñatvaṃ vā dīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ vā mahārājyamahābhogatāyairvā nṛpapriyatvaṃ vā |
645:356: āryamañjuśriyā sārdhamantravicaratā saṃkṣepato vā yanmanīṣitaṃ tat sarvaṃ dadāti |
645:360: saṃkṣepato yathā yathā ucyate tat sarvaṃ karoti |
645:361: prāktanaṃ vā karmāparādhaṃ vā saṃśodhayatītyāha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ ||
645:363: ādo tāvad tathā viśiṣṭe sthāne śucau deśe nadyāḥ pulinakūle vā pūrvavat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pañcānmukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ātmanaśca pūrvābhimukho bhūtvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ peyālaṃ vistareṇa kartavyam |
645:365: japaparisamāpte ca karṇikārapuṣpāṇāṃ śuklacandanamiśrāṇāṃ kuṅkumamiśrāṇāṃ vā śatasahasrāṇi juhuyāt |
645:366: pūrvavat tathaivāgniṃ prajvālya homaparyavasāne ca paṭaprakampane mantritvaṃ paṭaraśmyavabhāse niścarite ca raśmau rājyaṃ paṭasamantajvālamālākule caturmahārājakāyikarājyatvaṃ vākniścaraṇe paṭe trayaḥ tridaśeśvaratvaṃ śakratvaṃ paṭadharmadeśananiścaraṇe bodhisattvatribhūmeśvaratvaṃ paṭabāhumūrdhniṃ sparśane pañcābhijñāsaptabhūmimanuprāpaṇadaśabalaniyatamanupūrvaprāpaṇamiti ||
645:367: atha sādhakena bhagavāṃ kāśyapabhāṣitena mantre sādhite kṣutpipāsāpratighātārthamanuprāpte tenaiva vidhinā tenaivopakaraṇena mantracaryārthasādhanopayike dharme samanuṣṭheyam |
645:374: guhya taṃ pātraśeṣaṃ tu sarid gacche śubhodake ||
645:375: ekānte chorayitvā tu tiryebhyo dadau vratī |
645:376: tiryebhyo tu datvā vai pātraṃ prakṣālya yatnataḥ ||
645:377: mṛnmayaṃ tu punaḥ pākaṃ tataḥ kurvata yatnataḥ |
645:380: yasmin pātre aṭe bhikṣāṃ na jagdhe tatra bhojanam ||
645:381: na bhakṣe tatra bhakṣāṇi phaladravyāṇi tu sadā |
645:382: na bhuñjet padmapatreṇa na cāpi kuvalayodbhavaiḥ ||
645:383: saugandhikeṣu varjīta na bhuṅkte tatra mantriṇaḥ |
645:384: kaumudā ye ca patrā vai plakṣodumbarasambhavā ||
645:389: taṃ vṛkṣaṃ varjayed yatnāt tatkāṣṭhaṃ cāpi na khanet |
645:391: nāpi bhuṅkte kadā kasmiṃ sarve te varjitā budhaiḥ |
645:392: nāpi laṅghet kadā mohā munīnāṃ parṇaśālinām ||
645:393: samayād bhraśyate mantrī teṣāṃ parṇeṣu bhojane |
645:397: na bhuṅkte parṇapṛṣṭhaistu tathā hastatale tathā |
645:400: varjaye taṃ japī parṇaṃ padbhyāṃ caiva na laṅghayet ||
645:401: vividhāṃ bhakṣapūpāṃ tu tathā pānaṃ ca bhojanam |
645:402: na mantrī ādade yatnāt sarvaṃ caiva niveditam ||
645:404: ratnatraye'pi dattaṃ vai taṃ jāpī varjayet sadā ||
645:409: na siddhyanti tadā tasya nivedya balibhojinaḥ ||
645:412: anna sarveṣu dattvādyaṃ na bhuṅkte tatra jāpinaḥ |
645:414: bhojanaṃ svalpamātra tu svadattaṃ cāpi ādade |
645:415: ya eva pravṛtto mantrajño tasya siddhi kare sthitā ||
645:416: anena vidhinā taṃ jāpī bhojanaṃ ādaded vratī |
645:420: upaspṛśya tato jāpī idaṃ mantraṃ paṭhet sadā |
645:425: om sarvakilbiṣanāśani ! nāśaya nāśaya sarvaduṣṭaprayuktāṃ samayamanusmara hū jaḥ svāhā ||
645:426: anena mantreṇa bhikṣodanaṃ yaṃ vā anyaṃ paribhuṅkte sa mantrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā paribhoktavyaḥ |
645:427: bhuiktvā copaspṛśya pūrvavat mūrdhnaprati sarvaṃ kāyaṃ parāmṛjya tato viśrāntavyam |
645:428: viśrāmya ca muhūrtaṃ ardhārdhehayāmaṃ vā tataḥ paṭamabhivandya sarvabuddhānāṃ saddharmapustakāṃ vācayet |
645:429: āryaprajñāpāramitā āryacandrapradīpasamādhiṃ āryadaśabhūmakaḥ āryasuvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ āryamahāmāyūrī āryaratnaketudhāriṇīm |
645:431: tato parināmya yathāpariśaktitaśca vācayitvā pustakāmutsārya śucivastrapracchannāṃ vā kṛtā saddharmaṃ praṇamya tato snānāyamavatere nadīkūlaṃ mahāhradaṃ vā gatvā niṣprāṇakāṃ mṛttikāṃ gṛhya saptamantrābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā anena mantreṇa jalaṃ kṣipet | katamena ||
645:433: tadyathā - om sarvaduṣṭāṃ stambhaya hū indīvaradhāriṇe kumārakrīḍarūpadhāriṇe bandha bandha samayamanusmara sphaṭ sphaṭ svāhā |
645:434: anena tu rakṣāṃ kṛtvā diśābandhaṃ ca sahāyānāṃ ca maṇḍalabandhaṃ tuṇḍabandhaṃ sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭānāṃ sarvākarṣaṇaṃ ca śukrabandhaṃ saptajaptena sūtreṇa kaṭipradeśāvabaddhena sarvataśca paryaṭet |
645:435: japakāle ca sarvasmiṃ sarvakālasnānakāle ca duṣṭavighnavināśanamupraśamanārthamasya mantrasya lakṣamekaṃ japet |
645:439: tataḥ sādhakena mṛdgomayacūrṇādīṃ gṛhya snāyīta yathāsukham |
645:442: tato snātvā mṛdgomayānulepanairanyairvā sugandhagandhibhiścopakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ nāpi salile kheṭamūtrapurīṣādīnutsṛjet |
645:444: nāpi krīḍet karuṇāyamānaḥ sarvasattvānāmātmanaśca pratyavekṣya anātmaśūnyaduḥkhoparuddhavedanābhinunnaṃ rūrṇamiva mātṛviprayogaduḥkhitasattvo |
645:445: evaṃ sādhanarahito mantrajño hi tathāvidhaṃ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanādibhiḥ duḥkhopadhānairuparuddhyamānaṃ saṃsārārṇavagahanasthamātmānaṃ paśyet |
645:447: dhyāyīta kaṇṭhamātramudakastho nābhimātramudakasthito vā tatraiva tu jalamadhye cittaikāgratāmupasthāpya ||
645:448: prathamaṃ tāvanmahāpadmaviṭapaṃ mahāpadmapuṣpopetaṃ mahāpadmapatropaśobhitaṃ cārudarśanaratnamayaṃ vaidūryakṛtagaṇḍaṃ marakatapatraṃ padmakesaraṃ sphaṭikasahasrapatraṃ ativikasitaṃ tadā na jātasphaṭikapadmarāgapuṣpopaśobhitaṃ tatrasthaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ ratnamayamanekaratnopaśobhitaṃ duṣpayugapraticchannaṃ tatrasthaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dhyāyīta dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ kanakāvadātaṃ samantajvālamālinaṃ dhyāya prabhāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitaṃ mahāpramāṇaṃ vyomniriva ullikhamānaṃ paryaṅkopaniṣaṇṇam |
645:449: dakṣiṇataśca āryamañjuśrīḥ sarvālaṅkāravaropetaṃ padmāsanasthaṃ cāmaragrāhī bhagavataḥ sthitako no niṣaṇṇaḥ raktagaurāṅgaḥ piṣṭakuṅkumavarṇo vā vāmataśca āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ śaratkāṇḍagauraḥ camaravyagrahastaḥ |
645:450: evamaṣṭau bodhisattvāḥ āryamaitreyaḥ samantabhadraḥ kṣitigarbhaḥ gaganagañjaḥ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī apāyajaha āryavajrapāṇi sudhanaścetyete daśa bodhisattvāḥ dakṣiṇato pratyekabuddhāḥ aṣṭau dhyāyīta |
645:451: candanaḥ gandhamādanaḥ ketuḥ suketu sitaketu ṛṣṭaupāriṣṭanemiśceti |
645:453: tadyathā - āryamahāmaudgalyāyana śāriputra gavāmpati piṇḍola bharadvāja pilindavatsaḥ āryarāhulaḥ mahākāśyapa āryānandaśceti |
645:454: ityeṣāṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ samīpe anantaṃ bhikṣusaṅghaṃ dhyāyīta |
645:456: mahābodhisattvānāṃ cāṣṭāsu sthāneṣu anantaṃ bodhisattvasaṅghaṃ dhyāyīta ||
645:458: ātmanaśca nābhimātrodakastho nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ divyamānuṣyakaiḥ māndāravamahāmāndārava padmamahāpadmadhātuḥ kārikaindīvarakusumaiśca nānāvidhaiḥ mahāpramāṇaiḥ mahākūṭasthaiḥ puṣpapuṭaiḥ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kuryā |
645:459: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ cūrṇacchatradhvajapatākaiḥ divyamānuṣyakaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ pradīpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiśca pūjāṃ kuryānmanoramām ||
645:461: bhagavataśca śākyamune ūrṇakośādraśmiṃmabhiniścarantaṃ cātmānamavabhāsyamānaṃ sarvāsāṃ dhyāyīta |
645:462: samanantaradhyānagatasya jāpinaḥ brāhmapuṇyaphalāvāptiḥ niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavatīti ||
645:468: dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cāpi tṛtīyaṃ mantramataḥ param ||
645:469: prathame uttamā siddhiḥ madhyame tu tathā param |
645:474: siddhyanti tasya mantrā vai dhyāne'smiṃ supratiṣṭhitāḥ ||
645:475: yatheṣṭaṃ vidhinākhyātaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyātvā tu jāpinaḥ |
645:476: visarjya tatra vai mantraṃ arghaṃ dattvā yathāsukham ||
645:480: visarjya mantraṃ vai tatra āhūtā āśca devatāḥ ||
645:481: tato nikṛtvā rakṣā sahāyānāṃ vā tathaiva ca |
645:494: prakṣālya caraṇau jānormṛttikaiḥ sapta eva tu ||
645:500: tato pare yatheṣṭaṃ tu dakṣiṇāntāṃ diśāṃ bahiḥ |
645:504: tadā bhave tu binmantrī kuryāt pūticchoraṇam |
645:506: yatheṣṭaṃ tato gatvā deśaṃ vai śuciṃ prānte yathāvidhi |
645:507: kuṭiḥ prasravaṇaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃ deśe yathāsukham ||
645:508: uḍaye vā rahasicchanne gupte vā caiva bhūtale |
645:510: vigate mūtrapurīṣe tu kuryāt śaucaṃ sadā vratī |
645:512: gṛhya tisraṃ tathā caikaṃ gudau sadā ubhayānte ca karau tathā |
645:513: gṛhya pūrvaṃ tu nirdiṣṭamantriṇā ca sadā bhuvi ||
645:514: pādau prakṣālya yatnena dakṣiṇaṃ tu tataḥ param |
645:515: anyonyanaivaṃ saṃśliṣya pādā caiva sadā japī ||
645:525: caturthaṃ satyaśaucaṃ tu āpaḥ pañcama ucyate ||
645:541: punastiryagbhyo tathā prete yamaloke sadā punaḥ ||
645:545: bahukalpāṃ vaset tatra mṛṣāvādī tu jantunaḥ ||
645:546: kutastasya tu siddhyante mantrā vai mithyabhāṣiṇaḥ |
645:549: evaṃca vadate vācāṃ nāsti siddhistu mantriṇām |
645:550: kutastasya bhavet siddhiḥ bahukalpā na koṭibhiḥ ||
645:551: pratikṣipta yena buddhānāṃ śāsanaṃ tu mahītale |
645:552: tato'sau padyate ghore avidyāṃ tu mahābhaye ||
645:553: sañjīve kālasūtre ca narake ca pratāpane |
645:554: mahākalpaṃ vaset tatra saddharmo me vilopanāt ||
645:559: tasmāt pāpaṃ na kurvīta mithyākāryaṃ ca garhitam |
645:561: tasmāt śrāddho sadā bhūtvā sevanmantravidhiṃ sadā |
645:562: satyavādī ca mantrajño sattvānāṃ ca sadā hitaḥ |
645:563: bhajeta mantraṃ mantrajño dhruvaṃ siddhistu tasya vai ||
645:565: kriyā hi kurute karma nākriyā hi hitaṃ sadā ||
645:568: akriyārthaṃ kriyārthaṃ ca kriyākarma ca yujyate |
645:569: saphalaṃ caiva kriyā yasya kriyāṃ caiva sadā kuru ||
645:571: aphalaṃ phalatāṃ yānti phalaṃ caiva sadāphalam ||
645:581: ārabdhaṃ ārabhet karma akarmāṃ caiva nārabhet |
645:587: sidhyanti mantrāḥ sarve me yatra yukti sadā bhavet |
645:592: buddhatvaṃ prathamaṃ sthānaṃ niṣṭhaṃ tasya parāyaṇam ||
645:600: ādhipatyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ kurute saphalāṃ kriyām ||
645:608: sādhanaṃ tatra kurvīta prāptakāle tu jāpinaḥ ||
645:609: sidhyanti sarvakarmāṇi tathāpi tatra nityaṃ jāpī pāpakṣayācca puṃsām |
645:610: karoti mantrī vidhipūrvakarma yattat kṛtaṃ karmaparamparāsu ||
645:611: siddhiḥ sthitā tasya bhave kadādvā samagratāṃ yāva labhet puṃsaḥ |
645:612: japeta mantraṃ puna mantrajāpī pāpakṣayārthaṃ tata karmanāśanā ||
645:613: sidhyantu mantrāstu tathottamāni ye madhyamā kanyasalokapūjitā |
645:614: japena pāpaṃ kṣapayantyaśeṣaṃ yattat kṛtaṃ janmaparamparāsu ||
645:615: naśyanti pāpā tathā sarvadehināṃ karoti citrāṃ vividhāṅgabhūṣaṇām |
645:617: sarvārthasiddhiṃ samavāpnuvanti mantraṃ japitvā tu tathāgatānāmiti ||
